thread.title: FX's 'Legion' TV Show Will Standalone in 'X-Men' Movie Universe
thread.title_full: FX's 'Legion' TV Show Will Standalone in 'X-Men' Movie Universe

title: FX's 'Legion' TV Show Will Standalone in 'X-Men' Movie Universe
text:
Published By: MovieWeb.com: Movie News - Today 
Noah Hawley reveals that his new TV show 'Legion' will standalone and is not immediately connected to the sprawling 'X-Men' movie universe....
